text: Na upāhanāruḷhassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā
edit: Na upāhanāruḷhassa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā

translations.transtext: 62. I will not teach Dhamma to a person wearing leather footwear who is not ill: a training to be observed.
๖๒. พึงทำศึกษาว่า “เราจักไม่แสดงธรรมแก่บุคคลไม่ใช่ผู้เจ็บไข้สวมรองเท้า”
62. I shall not teach Dhamma to one wearing footwear who is not sick: this is a training to be done.
